executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Implement TC021 as a Playwright test targeting http://localhost:5173. Login using env vars E2E_EMAIL and E2E_PASSWORD (do not hardcode credentials). After landing on the dashboard, simulate long idle by setting localStorage key 'nesttask_supabase_auth' session expires_at to a timestamp in the past, then dispatch window focus and document visibilitychange events. Assert the app does not remain stuck in loading/skeleton state and that tasks API requests (/rest/v1/tasks) return 200 (or the UI returns to login if refresh fails). Include generous timeouts and log network responses for /token refresh and /rest/v1/tasks.
